content: Now He looked up and saw the wealthy putting their gifts into the  treasury.
And He saw a poor widow putting in two lepta coins.
And while some were talking about the temple, that it was decorated with beautiful stones and vowed gifts, He said,
They asked Him questions, saying, “Teacher, when therefore will these things happen? And what  the sign when these things are about to take place?”
And He told them a parable:
Now during the day He was teaching in the temple, but at evening He would go out and spend the night on the mountain that is called Olivet.
And all the people would get up very early in the morning  to Him in the temple to listen to Him.
